system.description:
You are able to use your gifts to turn your shadow into a real friend. You no longer cast a shadow in light, as it is now a loyal companion, having performed a dark ritual, it has been turned into a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-monsters.Actor.3Dn7LFKv63ql05tF]{Shade}.

While the shade is not your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6l4bmc7ovgcn2c9k]{Familiar}, it acts the same as one as per the spell. Furthermore, any features that affect your familiar through the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2mfiz8spijbzs6h]{Pact of the Chain} also affect your Shade.
